pareto_optimization¶

The class ParetoOptimization is a wrapper of Pareto optimization methods, even though currently there is only the canonical Pareto optimization method

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu
class pareto_optimization.ParetoOptimization[source]¶

Pareto optimization.

opt(objective, parameter)[source]¶

The optimization procedure.

Parameters:
  • objective – an Objective object
  • parameter – a Parameter object
Returns:

the best solution
